subject: PE Today: Greenfield Vs. FAIR
body:
CBSNews.com













Jeff 
      Greenfield Responds To FAIR's Critique Of Michael Moore 
      PieceI asked Greenfield to respond to the FAIR piece, which 
      generated more than 70 emails to Public Eye in an hour. "FAIR's critique is not," he argues. "The organization is comparing apples and 
      oranges; actually, apples and bowling balls is more like it."[+ Read More]



Sorry...Mark 
      Knoller: "A lot of people in the 
      news media – especially in television and radio – owe you an apology. 
      They think so little of what you’re interested in that many of us 
      led our newscasts overnight and this morning with the release from prison 
      of heiress and would-be celebrity Paris Hilton. When a story is 
      first in a newscast, we’re saying we think it’s important. We’re saying we 
      think it’s something you need to know about it."
 [+ Read More]



SportsCenter 
      for TerroristsThe theatrical release of "A Mighty Heart" – 
      the story of Daniel Pearl's kidnapping and murder – has called to mind 
      many Americans' first encounter with the grainy terrorist videos from 
      non-descript locations that have become a grim, regular reminder of 
      current affairs. But we're kidding ourselves if we think that the 
      stereotype of low-tech tools and old school propaganda is the reality in 
      Iraq and elsewhere.[+ Read More]
